page.title: 13A DAY OF A CARMARTHEN GIRL
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NICOLA PARRY My day starts at 7.30 a.m.I get up,dress into my clothes,wash and then have breakfast which consists of drinking chocolate,some kind of fruit and a slice of crispbread. Then I go and call for my friend Melanie James who lives in Parcmaen St.I walk with her as far as the bottom of Union Street,where my school is.School is a place where you go to learn about various subjects.My favourite subjects are English and Netball. School starts at 9.15 a.m.On Tuesdays and Fridays we have assembly. It is where the whole school gathers together to sing and pray to God. After assembly has finished,lessons start.On Tuesday,Maths,English,Science (cont. on next page)
